articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: 20 years of Mars Express! Check out unseen mosaic of red planet | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The European Space Agency has released a new mosaic of Mars, highlighting the planet's colour and composition details using data from the high Resolution Stereo Camera.
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) has released a new mosaic of the planet Mars to mark 20 years of the launch of the Mars Express. The mosaic reveals the red planet's colour and composition details, cr… [+2153 chars]

articles.author: Marcia Dunn
articles.title: First-of-its-kind Mars livestream by ESA spacecraft interrupted at times by rain on Earth - Phys.org
articles.description: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
articles.content:
A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
